channel.title: TechwithLC AI News
channel.description: Latest AI news curated and summarized by TechwithLC

item.title: Main Character of the Week: Crippling anxiety about the future
item.description: Daily Dot journalists just spent nine days this month at the South By Southwest (SXSW) conference. Here, business and arts leaders present their ideas for the future. Quantum computing, artificial intelligence, flying cars, bath houses with light shows, a mac…

item.title: AI startup seeks neurodiverse workforce in downtown St. Louis
item.description: CEO Peter Kant said he wanted to open Enabled Intelligence’s second office in St. Louis due to the promised growth of the North Side’s National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency campus.

item.title: Samsung Cuts Galaxy S25 Price With Three Special Offers
item.description: Samsung is offering significant discounts, storage upgrades and trade-in value to tempt consumers to consider the Galaxy S25 and Galaxy S25+.

item.title: Embrace discipline, integrity, and responsibility, Anwar tells youth
item.description: TUARAN: Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim has urged children and youth to embrace discipline, integrity, and responsibility while reminding leaders to serve the people diligently. Read full story

item.title: AI will soon be taking your drive-thru orders at 500 Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, KFC locations
item.description: Fast-food giant Yum! Brands said it will begin rolling out AI at hundreds of its locations starting in April. How has AI worked at other fast-food chains?
